title: Apply Dynamic Case Assignment Rules
overview: On Case creation, the automation evaluates Case fields and related records (e.g., Account) to assign the correct Owner (user or queue).
generalUseCase: Use a Self-Adaptive #Trigger to run before save transforms and validations on the triggering record. Reference related fields without explicit queries and Apex bulkification. All DSP built-in functions are bulkified including aggregations and VLOOKUPs.
